content: i came up with this easy pattern whilst on the dreaded lockdown it s really straightforward and quick to do i recommend using cotton yarn but it s not essential i actually made my latest one using a 50/50 mix of acrylic and cotton and it s fab stitches used are uk terms treble_crochet front post treble_crochet half treble_crochet each row is the same so no need to be checking the pattern constantly
